markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stunning Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2093) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
[Startling Appearance (Vigilante)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2088)

</column>

---

Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond. When you use [Startling Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2088), if your foe's level is equal to or lower than yours, they are also [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) on a hit, or stunned 2 on a critical hit.
name: Stunning Appearance
